title._content: Image taken from page 119 of 'Dumbarton, Vale of Leven, and Loch Lomond: historical, legendary, industrial and descriptive'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Dumbarton, Vale of Leven, and Loch Lomond: historical, legendary, industrial and descriptive" Author: MACLEOD, Donald - of Garelochside Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10370.bbb.34." Page: 119 Place of Publishing: Dumbarton Date of Publishing: 1884 Publisher: Bennett & Thomson Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002327788 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
